records.QueryText: Information regarding how to control mixed weeds in wheat crop ?
records.KccAns: Information regarding how to control mixed weeds in wheat crop ?spray 500 ml accord plus or 16 gm total or 160 gm vesta in 250 liter water / acre at 30-35 days after sowing time .

records.QueryText: weed management in 35 days old wheat crop ?
records.KccAns: Sulfosulfuron 75% + Metsulfuran Methyl 5% WG  16 gram dava ko 180 liter paani me ghol kar ek acre me chidkav kare
